SENT.plain: Marfan syndrome is an uncommon condition in pregnancy
We present the case of 37 years old gravida 1, para 1 with Marfan syndrome
She delivered at term by cesarean section, a healthy male infant weighing 3500 grams with Apgar's of 9
During the postoperative period she developed aortic dissection and was referred to the Cardiovascular Surgery Department
We described such a case and the difficult decisions that we faced
